Building an AI that can read your mind

This document discusses recent progress in developing technology that can detect brain activity non-invasively using EEG, with potential applications in human-robot interaction and mental healthcare.

Key Concepts:

  • Mental State Classification
  • Human Robot Interaction
  • Mental Healthcare
  • Non-Invasive Brain Activity Detection
AI Machine Learning EEG Brain-Computer Interface Autonomous Detection
